snippet: At least 20 others were injured after gunmen began shooting at a young woman’s 18th birthday celebration.
abstract: Authorities in Texas say house party in Houston suburb Cypress packed with teenagers and young adults turned deadly when gunfire erupted, killing two high school students and injuring at least 20 others partygoers who were either shot or hurt as they hopped over fences or jumped out of second-story windows in frantic rush to escape.
lead_paragraph: At least 20 others were injured after gunmen began shooting at a young woman’s 18th birthday celebration.

headline.main: Shots Fired Into Crowd at Party in Houston Suburb, Killing Two
headline.print_headline: Shots Fired Into Crowd at Party In Houston Suburb, Killing Two
